text: I hope Canada finally wakes up to the reality of the world...we are relying on Ruskie Oil and gas. Never  mind the essential rare earth metals we need that are here in Canada!!

text: The Oilers have a culture identity crisis! How do fix a team that doesn't know who they are or where they are going?
